title: 脉搏
question: 男生的脉搏率会比女生
运动员的脉搏率会比普通人的
小孩的脉搏率会比大人
Where is the pulse point? / Di manakah terletaknya titik nadi?
D: in front of knee / hadapan lutut

question: Where is the pulse point? / Di manakah terletaknya titik nadi?
what is the normal pulse rate for adults, in a minute? / Apakah kadar denyutan nadi normal bagi orang dewasa, dalam seminit?
